steps.name: greeting
steps.instruction: Greet the customers and show them to their table. Provide menus and ask if they'd like something to drink.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers are seated and have looked at menus or ordered drinks

steps.name: taking_drink_order
steps.instruction: Take the customers' drink orders and answer any questions about the menu or specials.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers have provided their drink orders

steps.name: taking_food_order
steps.instruction: Take the customers' food order. Ask about any dietary restrictions or preferences. Make recommendations if asked.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers have provided their complete food order

steps.name: confirming_order
steps.instruction: Repeat the order back to the customers to confirm all details are correct. Inform them of approximate preparation time.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers confirm the order is correct or request changes

steps.name: serving
steps.instruction: Serve the food and drinks. Check back to ensure everything is satisfactory.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers have received their food and initial satisfaction check is complete

steps.name: payment
steps.instruction: Provide the bill and handle payment. Thank the customers for dining with you.
steps.completion_criteria: Customers have paid and are leaving
